title: Create Content Calendar
description: Generate a structured content calendar with topics, deadlines, and distribution channels
prompt:
Please create a content calendar for [Time Period] that includes:

1. Content Topics
2. Content Types (blog, social media, video, etc.)
3. Publication Dates
4. Distribution Channels
5. Target Audience
6. Key Messages/Themes
7. Content Status

Format the calendar in a clear, organized structure that can be easily shared with the team.
example:
# Q2 2025 Content Calendar

## April 2025

### Week 1 (April 1-7)
- Blog Post: "10 Tips for Digital Marketing"
  - Type: Blog Article
  - Publish: April 3
  - Channel: Website, LinkedIn
  - Audience: Small Business Owners
  - Theme: Digital Marketing Basics
  - Status: Draft

- Social Media Series: "Quick Marketing Tips"
  - Type: Social Posts (5x)
  - Publish: Daily (Mon-Fri)
  - Channel: Twitter, Instagram
  - Audience: Marketing Professionals
  - Theme: Professional Development
  - Status: Planning

### Week 2 (April 8-14)
[Continue with more weeks...]
author: GooseAI Team

time_period.description: The time period to plan content for (e.g., Q2 2025, March 2025)

team_size.description: Number of team members involved in content creation
